content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    with(
        date_key INT 1,
        date DATE 2, 
        year SMALLINT 3,
        month TINYINT 4,
        day TINYINT 5,
        day_name varchar(10) 6,
        day_of_year SMALLINT 7,
        week_of_month TINYINT 8,
        week_of_year TINYINT 9,
        month_name varchar(10) 10,
        year_month INT 11,
        year_week INT 12
    ) AS [result]

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapse0001.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/calendar.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
'
